toggle_usb_rotation.description: Toggle the rotation of the USB.

adjust_usb_rotation.description: Adjust the rotation speed of the USB.

spin_usb.description: Spin the USB using its rotation link

status_usb_rotation.description: Check the current status of USB rotation

spin_usb_faster.description: Increase the rotation speed of the USB

slow_down_usb_rotation.description: Slow down the rotation speed of the USB

rotate_usb_clockwise.description: Rotate the USB in a clockwise direction.

rotate_usb_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the USB in an anti-clockwise direction.

rotate_usb_in_positive_direction.description: Rotate the USB in the positive direction.

rotate_usb_in_negative_direction.description: Rotate the USB in the negative direction.

rotate_usb_left.description: Rotate the USB to the left

rotate_usb_right.description: Rotate the USB to the right.

rotate_usb_back_and_forth.description: Rotate the USB back and forth.

touch_up_usb_body.description: Touch up the body of the USB.

inspect_usb_body.description: Inspect the body of the USB for any defects.

polish_usb_body.description: Polish the body of the USB to make it clean

status_usb_body.description: Inspect the current status of the USB body

buff_usb_body.description: Buff the USB body to remove any scratches

clean_usb_body.description: Clean the USB body to remove dust or any other particles.

wipe_usb_body.description: Wipe the USB body to remove dirt and debris.

wipe_usb_front.description: Wipe the front of the USB body to clean it.

wipe_usb_back.description: Wipe the back of the USB body to clean it.

wipe_usb_sides.description: Wipe the sides of the USB body to clean it.

clean_and_adjust_usb.description: Wipe the USB body and adjust its rotation.

adjust_and_clean_usb.description: Adjust the rotation of the USB and wipe its body.

clean_rotation_usb.description: Clean the rotating part of the USB.

rotate_then_touch_up_usb.description: rotate the USB and then touch up the body.

spin_and_polish_usb.description: Spin the USB then polish the body

polish_and_spin_usb.description: Polish the USB body then spin the USB

complete_status_check_usb.description: Perform a complete status check of the USB

buff_and_spin_usb.description: Buff the USB body to remove scratches and then spin the USB

spin_and_buff_usb.description: Spin the USB and then buff the body to remove scratches

rotate_and_clean_usb.description: Rotate the USB and then clean it.

clean_and_rotate_usb.description: Clean the USB body and then rotate it.

status_check_usb.description: Check the status of the entire USB.

rotate_then_wipe_usb.description: First rotate the USB and then clean it.

wipe_then_rotate_usb.description: First Clean the USB and then rotate it.

full_clean_usb.description: Clean the entire USB including the body and rotation part.

rotate_wipe_rotated_usb.description: Rotate the USB first and then clean the rotated part.

clean_whole_usb.description: Clean the entire USB including the USB body and the rotation part.

rotate_clean_usb.description: Rotate the USB and then clean it.

clean_rotate_usb.description: Clean the USB and then rotate it.

rotate_and_wipe_usb.description: First rotate the USB and then wipe it clean.

wipe_and_rotate_usb.description: First wipe the USB clean and then rotate it.

clean_usb_rotations.description: Clean the USB rotation part to remove dust or any other particles.
